ygData.subject: Re: Reinforcements
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, Skulletron was in the brig, with Smokescreen watching. I have no idea how he could have appeared at a CR. ... Zardus looks over at Soundave, dodging

Actually, Skulletron was in the brig, with Smokescreen watching. I have no 
idea how he could have appeared at a CR.'

::Zardus/Oblitertron::

Zardus looks over at Soundave, dodging an optic shot. "Fire at those fools," 
he says, pointing to the crazy-looking Lavacons running through the forest.

Aiming his plasma launcher, he fires a hit at Fenox.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Oblitertron roars, firing his optics at Astral and his rifle at Fenox as they 
start their rampage.
